## Simple portfolio

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/60034035/393283056-cb0ca01d-d5bf-4978-b0a1-d0714bfb5e85.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..0m1S7xXPyF3UXjJMUd6d3IYFgaGp-MAjFX0YDQOpG8c">


### Update Info
To update about go to `js/about.js` and update the info
```
{
    name: "",
    description: "",
    image: "",
    cv: "#",
    email: "mailto:",
    linkedin: "",
    google_scholar: "",
}
```


## Update Config
To update config go to `js/config.js` and update the info
```
socials = [
  { key: "", icon: "", label: "" },
  # Add more socials
  
]

tags = []  ## Here add the tags
```
